description: This file contains code that sets up an agent with specific tools and models, runs a query to fetch stock price data, and prints various metrics and responses related to the agent's operation.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with tools and models to perform tasks.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Represents the response from an agent run, including messages and metrics.

methods.name: agent.run
methods.description: Executes a query with the agent, returning a stream of responses.

methods.name: pprint_run_response
methods.description: Pretty prints the run response stream.

methods.name: pprint
methods.description: Pretty prints objects, used here for metrics and session data.
